    • iteratorMstNetwork

      public Iterator<T> iteratorMstNetwork(T startVertex, T targetVertex)
      Returns an iterator that traverses the minimum spanning tree (MST) network from the specified start vertex to the target vertex. If there is no path in the MST network between the start and target vertices, the shortest path algorithm is used instead.
      Specified by:
      iteratorMstNetwork in interface ModifiedGraphADT<T>
      Overrides:
      iteratorMstNetwork in class ModifiedGraph<T>
      Parameters:
      startVertex - the starting vertex
      targetVertex - the target vertex
      Returns:
      an iterator that traverses the MST network from the start to target vertex
